void debugtools.VardumpCommand.Execute ( )[inline]
Executes an action by invoking the receiver's method with a specific command.
This method calls the _receiver to perform an action with the command "vardump". The purpose of this action is to trigger a specific behavior defined in the receiver's implementation. It does not return any value and is intended to be used when the action needs to be executed without any parameters. Here is the call graph for this function:
